replies.author: 遗忘的流髑
replies.txt_content:
你OpenGL好像不支持吧

重点摘录：
       java.lang.NullPointerException: Ticking memory connection
        Memory: 349124312 bytes (332 MB) / 649068544 bytes (619 MB) up to 4294967296 bytes (4096 MB)
        GL info: ~~ERROR~~ RuntimeException: No OpenGL context found in the current thread.
        Armourer's Workshop: 

这里给大佬提供一点线索，时装工坊mod是不是需求更高的OpenGL?
